articles.title: Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs appears for first day of his sex trafficking trial - The Washington Post
articles.description: Jury selection is underway in the high-profile sex trafficking trial of Sean “Diddy” Combs. He could face life in prison if convicted in New York federal court.

articles.title: 'James' wins 2025 Pulitzer Prize for fiction - NPR
articles.description: The 2025 Pulitzer Prizes were announced Monday afternoon. Percival Everett won the award for fiction for his novel James, a powerful re-imagination of Huckleberry Finn.
articles.content:
The 2025 Pulitzer Prize winners are here.
